last_episode_to_air.name: Future Unknown
last_episode_to_air.overview: A celebration is underway aboard the ship.

name: The Orville
overview: Follow the crew of the not-so-functional exploratory ship in the Earth's interstellar fleet, 400 years in the future.

episodes.name: Old Wounds
episodes.overview: It's 2417, and the Planetary Union promotes Ed Mercer to Captain of the exploratory vessel The U.S.S. Orville. Ed's enthusiasm for his new position is dampened when his ex-wife, Kelly Grayson, is assigned to be his First Officer. While on their first routine mission, the Orville crew is ambushed by the Krill, a vicious alien race, who are bent on stealing a device that can cause time to accelerate.

episodes.name: Command Performance
episodes.overview: When Ed and Kelly are tricked by a hologram of a ship in distress and find themselves prisoners in a replica of their former home, Alara must step up in her first command of the Orville and attempt a heroic rescue. Meanwhile, Bortus and Klyden receive some happy, yet unexpected news.

episodes.name: About a Girl
episodes.overview: The Orville crew is divided between cultures when Bortus and Klyden debate if their newly born offspring should receive a controversial surgery.

episodes.name: If the Stars Should Appear
episodes.overview: Ed and the Orville crew encounter a massive vessel adrift in space, which is in danger of colliding with a star. While some of the crew set out to help the ship's inhabitants, Bortus, Gordon, and John stay behind and fend off a Krill attack on another Union ship

episodes.name: Pria
episodes.overview: After the crew saves a stranded ship and its attractive captain, Ed becomes smitten with the Orvilleâs new guest, while Kelly suspects all is not what it seems. Meanwhile, Gordon attempts to teach Isaac the art of pulling off a practical joke.

episodes.name: Krill
episodes.overview: After the Orville crew defeats a Krill attack on a brand-new colony, the Union sends Ed and Gordon on a dangerous undercover mission to infiltrate a Krill ship and obtain a copy of the Krill bible, the "Anhkana," to better understand the enemy.

episodes.name: Majority Rule
episodes.overview: When two Union anthropologists go missing on a planet similar to 21st century Earth, Ed sends a team led by Kelly to find them, but the mission quickly goes awry when they realize the societyâs government is completely based on a public voting system to determine punishment.

episodes.name: Into the Fold
episodes.overview: Ed and the crew set out to save Dr. Finn, her two sons and Isaac after their shuttle gets thrown into uncharted space and they crash-land on a moon that is light years from the Orville.

episodes.name: Cupid's Dagger
episodes.overview: The Orville is called to mediate a peace treaty between two warring cultures, but tensions run even higher between Ed and Kelly when a familiar face boards the ship. Meanwhile Yaphit declares his love for Dr. Finn with surprising results.

episodes.name: Firestorm
episodes.overview: When a fire breaks out on The Orville and a crew member dies, Alara begins to question if she is fit for her job, just as unusual and terrifying things start happening on the ship.

episodes.name: New Dimensions
episodes.overview: Kelly discovers that Lt. John Lamarr is smarter than he lets on. So, she pushes Ed to consider him for a key leadership position on the ship after The Orville gets damaged by a mysterious spatial anomaly causing harrowing effects to all things living.

episodes.name: Mad Idolatry
episodes.overview: Ed and Kelly consider the possibility of reforging their relationship, but Kelly soon crash-lands on a planet in another universe with Isaac and Gordon.

episodes.name: Ja'loja
episodes.overview: As The Orville heads towards Moclus for Bortus' special once-a-year ceremony, Ed discovers Kelly has moved on and has started dating. Meanwhile, Gordon asks for John's help in getting game, and Claire turns to Isaac for parenting advice.

episodes.name: Primal Urges
episodes.overview: Ed and the crew race to save a small group of survivors on a planet about to be destroyed by its sun. Meanwhile, Bortus and Klyden start marriage counseling when Bortus' obsession with the ship's simulation room gets out of hand.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.overview: Ed, Gordon and Alara visit Alara's home planet of Xelayah.

episodes.name: Nothing Left on Earth Excepting Fishes
episodes.overview: Ed finds himself behind enemy lines when he crash-lands on a mysterious planet. Meanwhile, Kelly questions why Gordon wants to take the Command Test.

episodes.name: All the World is Birthday Cake
episodes.overview: The Orville makes First Contact and a new crew member joins the ship.

episodes.name: A Happy Refrain
episodes.overview: The Orville crew is surprised when Claire's personal life takes an unexpected turn, and Gordon makes an unusual grooming suggestion to Bortus.

episodes.name: Deflectors
episodes.overview: One of Bortus's old lovers is assigned to help upgrade the ships defences and makes a surprising admission to Talla.

episodes.name: Identity (1)
episodes.overview: Ed and the crew travel to Isaac's home planet, Kaylon.

episodes.name: Identity (2)
episodes.overview: The Kaylons take control of the Orville with the intention of destroying all biological lifeforms.

episodes.name: Blood of Patriots
episodes.overview: Ed must initiate peace talks with the Krill.

episodes.name: Lasting Impressions
episodes.overview: The Orville crew members open a time capsule from 2015.

episodes.name: Sanctuary
episodes.overview: Ed discovers that Moclans aboard The Orville are harboring a secret.

episodes.name: Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow
episodes.overview: A time distortion affects Ed and Kelly's relationship.

episodes.name: The Road Not Taken
episodes.overview: The crew must contend with the disastrous fallout from Kelly's decision.

episodes.name: Electric Sheep
episodes.overview: The Orville crew deals with the interpersonal aftermath of the battle against the Kaylon.

episodes.name: Shadow Realms
episodes.overview: The Orville explores a mysterious region of space.

episodes.name: Mortality Paradox
episodes.overview: The Orville crew makes a new discovery.

episodes.name: Gently Falling Rain
episodes.overview: The Orville crew leads a Union delegation to sign a peace treaty with the Krill.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Topas
episodes.overview: Tensions between Kelly and the Moclans result when she helps Topa prepare for the Union Point entrance exam.

episodes.name: Twice in a Lifetime
episodes.overview: The crew must rescue Gordon from a distant yet familiar world.

episodes.name: From Unknown Graves
episodes.overview: The Orville discovers a Kaylon with a very special ability.

episodes.name: Midnight Blue
episodes.overview: The crew visit Haveena's sanctuary world and embark on a journey that may leave the Union more vulnerable.

episodes.name: Domino
episodes.overview: The creation of a powerful new weapon puts the Orville crew â and the entire Union â in a political and ethical quandary.

episodes.name: Future Unknown
episodes.overview: A celebration is underway aboard the ship.
